entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:19 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
